title: Fix zero division error in math_utils module
body:
## Problem Description
The `divide()` function in `src/math_utils.py` crashes when the divisor is zero, causing the application to terminate unexpectedly.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Call `divide(10, 0)`
2. Application crashes with ZeroDivisionError

## Expected Behavior
The function should handle zero division gracefully and return `None` or raise a custom exception with a helpful message.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add zero division check to `divide()` function
- [ ] Return `None` when division by zero is attempted
- [ ] Add comprehensive test cases including edge cases
- [ ] Document the behavior in function docstring
- [ ] Ensure no performance regression
